name: Chromasthasia
description:
Hey we are a small Team named NoMe and we are students from Germany, that developed this small Game for the Macromedia GameJam :)

Description

The link between seeing and hearing!

In Chromasthasia you are the composer and artist at once. Draw the most beautiful pixel art pictures and listen to them afterwards or compose songs and watch which pattern was created from your favorite melody. There are seven instruments with own colour pallets.

Become creative and experiment with colour and sound!
